fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't. Let's go.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't. Let's go."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't. Mail the letter and let's be done with this."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Your toe has suffered damage. It hu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your toe has suffered damage. It hurts!

fields.Title: You: "I feel you, mail collection box."
fields.Dialogue Text: I feel you, mail collection box.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, you're being sarcastic. I get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, you're being sarcastic. I get it. It was actually a dick move."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Dodged the bullet there... He must..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dodged the bullet there... He must see the box as the weaker of the two, and you as a bully -- something he doesn't stand for.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He must see the box as the weaker o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He must see the box as the weaker of the two, and you as a bully -- something he doesn't stand for.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "Other than kicking? You were right!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Other than kicking? You were right!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not going to be that easy. We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not going to be that easy. We need to dirty our hands with the signatures." He looks around. "I assume that's the goal here."

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "You drop the white envelope in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You drop the white envelope in the darkness. It lands with a soft thud on what sounds like a couple of letters.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, let's go back to Evrart."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, let's go back to Evrart." The lieutenant turns towards the industrial harbour. "If we don't mention anything to him, he won't know before it's too late."

fields.Title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pats the box on the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant pats the box on the head, ever so slightly, before walking away.

fields.Title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "About a week's worth of mail has co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: About a week's worth of mail has collected in there. They'll empty this very soon.

fields.Title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "For good or ill, the deed is done."
fields.Dialogue Text: For good or ill, the deed is done.

fields.Title: You: ""Good mail delivery box." (Pat the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good mail delivery box." (Pat the box.)

fields.Title: You: "Mail collection box, you should man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mail collection box, you should man the fuck up.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box has no fait..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mail collection box has no faith in your psychopathic manipulations.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The dented yellow mailbox greets yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dented yellow mailbox greets you with it's graffito and bullet holes in the front.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "Other than developing a personal re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Other than developing a personal relationship? Looks like you were right.

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck you, mail delivery box!" (Kic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck you, mail delivery box!" (Kick it.)

fields.Title: You: "Been there, *Poste L'Aventurier* ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Been there, *Poste L'Aventurier* mail collection box... been there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pats the box, ever s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant pats the box, ever so slightly.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box has no fait..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mail collection box has no faith in your psychopathic manipulations.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A faint sticker on the side reads:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A faint sticker on the side reads: "RCM Emergencies Desk no 8-100-2", with a slogan: "Mankind, be vigilant!"

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): ""Eat shit, pig!", "FUCKED BY THE CU..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eat shit, pig!", "FUCKED BY THE CUNN" and "Saint-G" with a crown have been scribbled on it. "Jennie is a WHORE" and "*Baise cette* mailbox!" also.

fields.Title: You: "Drop the white envelope into the ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drop the white envelope into the mailbox.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "This "Poste L'Aventurier" mail coll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This "Poste L'Aventurier" mail collection box has been heavily vandalized with graffito. A closer inspection reveals two bullet holes in the front.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He does not actually think it's coo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not actually think it's cool. If anything, the lieutenant feels sorry for the poor box -- he's leaning in to inspect the layers of graffito that deface it.

fields.Title: You: "(Rub your toe.) "You think so? You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Rub your toe.) "You think so? You think it was cool?"

fields.Title: Logic: "It's not going to be that easy. Evr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not going to be that easy. Evrart wants you to dirty your hands getting these signatures and he will quickly find out if you just mail.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The box seems happy."
fields.Dialogue Text: The box seems happy.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool." The lieutenant nods approvi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool." The lieutenant nods approvingly. "You really showed that mail collection box."

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The dented yellow mailbox greets yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dented yellow mailbox greets you with it's graffito, bullet holes and an RCM sticker.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Other than kicking?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Other than kicking?"

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "But the documents inside the envelo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But the documents inside the envelope still lack the required signatures...

fields.Title: You: ""I knew we'd get to use this mailbo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew we'd get to use this mailbox -- for something."
fields.Alternate1: I knew I'd get to use this mailbox -- for something.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow, saddened ring as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a hollow, saddened ring as you kick the L'Aventurier mail collection box. It sounds betrayed, in disbelief even.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow ring as you kick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a hollow ring as you kick the box. It sounds like it's mostly empty. Your toe hurts now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. For sending mail.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. For sending mail."

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow ring as you kick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a hollow ring as you kick the box. It sounds like it's mostly empty. Your toe hurts now.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The mail collection box seems catha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mail collection box seems cathartic, thankful even. So do you. You shudder. Then you swallow.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The mailbox does not know how to ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mailbox does not know how to man up, it is an inanimate object.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "There is a hollow, saddened ring as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a hollow, saddened ring as you kick the L'Aventurier mail collection box. It sounds betrayed, in disbelief even.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go back to Evrart." The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go back to Evrart." The lieutenant turns towards the industrial harbour. "This better be worth it -- after what we did."

fields.Title: Logic: "Probably did the right thing. You c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Probably did the right thing. You can't trust that slug Evrart -- you *know* he's going to play you somehow.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Shivers: "And then suddenly you see it: over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then suddenly you see it: over all the other graffitos someone has -- using the tip of a very sharp knife -- cut the words: REVACHOL FOREVER.

fields.Title: Mail Collection Box: "The box seems happy."
fields.Dialogue Text: The box seems happy.
